title: Riot/@meddler, would you please consider supporting Lichbane for bot lane mages?
body:
Lichbane has always been one of my favorite items because of how it can provide both sustain and burst damage. Most mages use it for burst, but you can use it for sustain if you have low cooldowns or try to cast atleast 1 spell on a 1.5 second interval.

Hence, would adding Lichbane to the new 20%/500 mana AP item set be op? 

Compared to {{item:3078}} 20% cdr should be fine if you raise the cost of lichbane as well.

In any case, I think lichbane would be a great addition to sustain damage mages bot.

replies.body: No please. Lulu Janna and support role in general is OP as fuck.
That would most likely make it far too easy to hit 40% cdr for burst mages. Bot lane support makes will want utility items instead anyways. Example: Ardent Censer.
How would that help bot lane specifically? That's just a generic buff. And an unneeded one at that.
